short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Properties for Dropbox folders. Get size, number of files, and number of subdirectories

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get properties of Dropbox folders with two click.
Includes information such as:
 - total size of all files under directory
 - number of files inside directory
 - number of subdirectories inside directories
(more to be added)

Steps:
 1. Left or right click on folder
 2. Click the red "P" icon that shows up on the right side of the title bar
 
FAQ:
How well does this perform?
Efficiency is ensured by making at most 2 server calls.

I want another statistic to be displayed, how can I configure it for that?
To be implemented.
